LanguageData.CustomMapSize.Label: Custom Map Size
LanguageData.CustomMapSize.Warning: Warning: Custom map sizes is untested.
LanguageData.CustomMapSize.WarningTooSmall: Warning: Map too small! You are not able to build on this. Maps have 10 cell unbuildable border at each side.
LanguageData.CustomMapSize.WarningTooLarge: Warning: Map too large! Maps more then 1000 may loading Forever.
